title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4120.19 - Use and disposal of hypodermic syringes and needles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4120.19 - Use and disposal of hypodermic syringes and needles

State Regulations

To ensure drug testing accuracy, all hypodermic syringes
and needles may be used only once by a track or practicing veterinarian or
veterinary technician. The collection, security and disposal of the used
syringes and needles are the responsibility of a track or practicing
veterinarian or veterinary technician. Notes

4120.19

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/10/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
